p: SEO, used as additional compounds in our study, contains, as major compounds, o-cymene (30.728%), thymol (25.746%), and γ-terpinene (11.821%). Other compounds were identified in concentrations lower than 10%. The group of Katar et al. (2017) reported γ-terpinene and carvacrol as major components and highlighted that the climatic and geographic conditions influence the chemical composition of SEO [ 37].
